name: Elephant Run Simulator 2016 – Non Stop City Rampage & Crashing Defense against Hunters and Bulls
name_original: Elephant Run Simulator 2016 – Non Stop City Rampage & Crashing Defense against Hunters and Bulls
description:
Be Elly, the wild elephant in the angry elephant simulator mania. Attack the city as The Angry Elephant in this jungle animals game! Don’t under estimate the power of this gentle yet robust wild savanna jungle creature. Forget the talking elephant or dancing elephant bar and enjoy this elephant game with sound in the ultimate city rampage.

BEWARE OF Elephant Hunters The city mayor has called hunters to help clear the city from this huge mammoth. Attack the hunter before it shoots you. A Refreshing change for all the cascade players of wild animals in the jungle lion, gorilla, monkey savanna simulator and all the wild animal transporter games.

Wild Elephant City Rampage 3D Features:
- 3 real models of Wild Elephants
- Multiple action packed missions
- Realistic elephant attack animations
- Town area full of preys( civilians, tourist, goats, sheeps and rabbits
- Hunters and police dog German Shepherd for hunting
- Vibrant gameplay with thrilling challenges
- Create cascade of chaos & crush the whole city!

Get the real feel of jungle animal’s fury in the latest Elephant Run Simulator 2016.
